articles.description: Follow live text and radio coverage as Manchester City visit Crystal Palace, plus build-up to six more Premier League games.
articles.title: Premier League: De Bruyne scores stunning Man City equaliser at Crystal Palace

articles.description: Follow live text and listen to BBC radio commentary of Saturday's action in the Champions Cup, including Exeter Chiefs v Bath, Bordeaux v Saracens and Leinster v Leicester.
articles.title: Champions Cup: Exeter 7-5 Bath - Vintcent replies after Du Toit opener

articles.description: Manchester City maintain their title challenge in ruthless fashion as Kevin de Bruyne claims 100th club goal in victory at Crystal Palace.
articles.title: De Bruyne shines as Man City maintain title challenge

articles.description: Moving the Japanese Grand Prix from autumn to April has painted it with the country's famous cherry blossom, but otherwise it has been business as usual.
articles.title: Japanese Grand Prix 2024: Max Verstappen returns to power, but are Mercedes blossoming?'

articles.description: Ander Herrera has won league titles and European trophies, but is chasing his father's dream with Athletic Bilbao.
articles.title: Herrera living out his father's dream in cup final

articles.description: Northern Ireland's Rory McIlroy cards a 70 in the second round of the Texas Open to remain six shots behind leader Akshay Bhatia.
articles.title: Texas Open: Rory McIlroy stays six shots off leader Akshay Bhatia after second round

articles.description: Dominic Calvert-Lewin capitalises on an Arijanet Muric error to score his second goal in as many games and help Everton to a priceless win over fellow strugglers Burnley.
articles.title: Everton beat Burnley to boost survival hopes

articles.description: Watch as New York Mets third base Brett Baty takes a stunning one-handed diving catch as the New York Mets beat the Cincinnati Reds 3-2.
articles.title: 'What a play!' Mets star takes stunning one-handed catch

articles.description: Carlton Morris' late winner boosts Luton's Premier League survival hopes as they come from behind to beat Bournemouth.
articles.title: Late Morris winner seals Luton fightback

articles.description: PJ Washington scores with 4.5 seconds left to help the Dallas Mavericks beat the Golden State Warriors 108-106.
articles.title: NBA: PJ Washington leads Dallas Mavericks to win over Golden State Warriors
